public class RtfElement
extends Object

RtfElement is the base class for all RTF Element classes Version: $Id: RtfElement.java,v 1.8 2004/12/14 15:14:44 blowagie Exp $

Author:
Mark Hall (mhall@edu.uni-klu.ac.at)
